channel.title: Need help huge run error plz ::confused
channel.description:
when i went to go run any client i got this huge error can anyone tell me how to fix it here it is
# # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x6d971808, pid=3748, tid=1988 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (1.6.0_10-ea-b08 mixed mode windows-x86) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0xe1808] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
